This file is for electron-builder. It serves as the second package.json (for the two package.json build strategy) so we don't include more dependencies than needed.
Other properties are filled in the build config using the main package.json.
It is only for building. It is not installed but not actually used.
It's needed because there's no way to override 'dependencies` in the package.json read by electron-builder.
name property is needed here even if we override it
name: ignore
